entries.title: Taskbar clock display seconds
entries.description: Changes the clock on the taskbar to show the current time with increased precision by including seconds.

entries.title: Remove Cortana from the taskbar
entries.description: This will not only remove the Cortana icon from the taskbar but also hide the option to toggle the Cortana icon from the context menu by right-clicking the taskbar.

entries.title: Remove the Task View icon from the taskbar
entries.description: This will ONLY remove the Task View icon from the taskbar but NOT hide the option to toggle the Task View icon from the context menu by right-clicking the taskbar. You could essentially do this without any Registry tricks, just right-clicking the taskbar and unselecting the option in the context menu would suffice, but here we are.

entries.title: Replace previews with list view
entries.description: Changes the preview when hovering over an active icon on the taskbar from showing the window(s) as a preview to a list containing just the title of each window.

entries.title: Disable previews
entries.description: Changes the preview when hovering over an active icon on the taskbar from showing the window(s) as a preview to a list containing just the title of each window.

entries.title: Disable Bing search suggestions
entries.description: This will disable the Bing search suggestions that show at the bottom of your search results.

entries.title: Other thing
entries.description: This will automatically delete the "pagefile.sys" system memory paging file during each shutdown. This will free up some disk space at the cost of startup and shutdown speeds.

entries.title: dfdfdfdfdf
entries.description: This will automatically delete the "pagefile.sys" system memory paging file during each shutdown. This will free up some disk space at the cost of startup and shutdown speeds.

entries.title: dfdfdfdfdfdfdfdfdfdf
entries.description: This will automatically delete the "pagefile.sys" system memory paging file during each shutdown. This will free up some disk space at the cost of startup and shutdown speeds.
